prompts: Create a dragon-type Pokemon with sharp claws and a sleek body.
I want a fierce-looking Pokemon that can burrow underground and fly.
Generate a Pokemon with a blue and orange color scheme and spiky dorsal fins.
Make a powerful dragon-type creature that thrives in mountainous regions.
Imagine a Pokemon that is a mix of a land and sky predator with impressive speed.
Design a Pokemon known for its agility and ability to navigate caves effortlessly.
Show me a Pokemon that embodies both strength and cunning in battle.
